pages.text: Let's start with $(thing)Items.$() This is where you go to equip any item relating to the $(thing)Kingdom Keys$() mod. This being Keyblades/$(orgxiii)Organization XIII$() weapons, Kingdom Keys specific Armors/Accessories and consumable Items (such as Potions, Hi-Potions, Ethers, Elixirs, etc.)
After equiping your Keyblade you can summon it with $(thing)[$(k:key.kingdomkeys.summonkeyblade)]$().
